channel.title: Twisteverything's Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to Adrian Xavier's world. Here you can listen to Adrian's alter ego "Mama". This 60 year old cuban woman has got plenty to say so listen up!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Don't get it twisted!
channel.itunes:author: Adrian Xavier
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to Adrian Xavier's world. Here you can listen to Adrian's alter ego "Mama". This 60 year old cuban woman has got plenty to say so listen up!

item.title: Mama Talks Episode 1
item.description: Hey Babies this is mama.. i want to welcome you to my first podcast. This first episode i talk about Bo the metrosexual dog. The amazing Susan Boyle of Britan's got Talent and music artist Lisa Shaw... I hope you enjoy the show.. remember Mama luvs you... 04152009
item.dc:creator: Adrian Xavier
item.itunes:summary:
Hey Babies this is mama.. i want to welcome you to my first podcast. This first episode i talk about Bo the metrosexual dog. The amazing Susan Boyle of Britan's got Talent and music artist Lisa Shaw... I hope you enjoy the show.. remember Mama luvs you...
04152009
